reviews.review_msg: Amazing Prof. Very clear about what he wanted and was a straight-forward marker. Loved this class. It was definitely a lot of work but it was a great experience.

Amazing guy. Super upbeat and fun, great sense of humour, very chill and accommodating if you forgot your homework, need to leave class early, etc. However, this was the hardest class I've ever done. There is homework due almost every class, even on quiz days which are almost every other week. It seems easy at first but the work load is brutal.

Stephen is a great prof! He does go a little overboard with the modern stuff but he's so passionate about it that it's difficult not to get interested. He's a totally nice guy, very smart, funny, laid- back, and HOT! I loved going to class b/c he tried to incorporate diff types of media to teach: poetry, novels, film, etc. Highly recommend!!
